Catalano.Imaging.Filters

Class ArtifactsRemoval

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Filters.ArtifactsRemoval
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBaseInPlace

    public class ArtifactsRemoval
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBaseInPlace
    Remove artifacts caused by uneven lightning. Actually this technique is useful as a preprocessing step for all texture measures.
    See Also:
    Imaging: digital image analysis and processing / Scott E. Umbaugh. Chapter 6. p. 276
